text: Abdul Khaliq Hazara was the murderer of Muhammad Nadir Shah, the king of Afghanistan. ==Birth and identity== Abdul Khaliq Hazara was born in year 1916 in a family of Hazara ethnic group in Kabul Afghanistan. == References == Category:Hazara people Category:People from Kabul Category:1933 deaths Category:20th-century Afghan people
title: Abdul Khaliq Hazara
